summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of PMR Medical Education Platform with blue pastel theme improvements. All major features including floating TOC, continuous layout, rich text editor, and media section are working correctly.
passed_tests: Login page displays with beautiful blue pastel theme
Admin login works successfully with admin@pmr.edu / admin123
Dashboard displays correctly with blue theme consistency
Disease page shows continuous text layout (not card-based)
Floating TOC positioned on right side with 15 navigation links
TOC links properly navigate to sections when clicked
Scroll spy functionality works - active section highlights as user scrolls
Edit buttons appear on hover for admin users
Rich text editor opens with complete formatting toolbar (7 buttons)
Formatting buttons include Bold, Italic, Underline, Bullet List, Numbered List, Undo, Redo
Media section displays at bottom of page
Add Media button opens dialog with URL input and file upload options
Media dialog has proper fields: Image URL, Caption, Choose File
Blue theme persists in dark mode (26 blue elements detected)
Dark mode can be toggled on/off successfully
Continuous content sections flow properly (14 sections found)
Admin editing functionality works for content sections
success_percentage: Frontend: 100% - All tested features working correctly
